page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: The typical house a family would live in is a semi-detatched.There would be a ground and first floor.On the ground floor we have a living-room and kitchen.The objects in our living-room are television,video and a suite.In our kitchen the automatic washing machine,tumble dryer,fridge-freezer and gas cooker really help mum.On the first floor.We have bedrooms and a bathroom.In the bedroom we have beds and wardrobes.On Saturday I help my mum do the housework by using the hoover to clean carpets and polish to clean tables etc.I sometimes help mum by washing the dishes or doing the shopping in one of the local supermarkets.Outside,we have a garden where we grow vegetables and flowers.We have a car for going runs and using it for work.
